-------100k downloads reached!----------- What is Last Wood?

Last Wood is a craft & survival manager game where you can craft and build your home, gather food, or reproduce the next generation ;)

Last Wood is still in demo but we'll continue expanding it. We'll post devlogs throughout our development process. We’d appreciate any suggestions, and comments, feel free to stream it or record your gameplay, post your gameplay videos.

Story

You're the last couple on earth. Floating on the ocean with nothing but a  lemon tree.

Controls

GamePlay

Left Click On Buildings：Assign Task / Open Bill / Check Storage

Right Click When Building: Unselect BluePrint

R: Rotate BluePrint

Space: Pause (But you can still operate)

num1~9 / Tab: Switch Focused Floor. (You need to fouse on a certain floor to build on that floor. )

Escape: System Panel ( auto save setting, low graphics setting, save/load, restar, quit) 

Cameras

Drag Right Mouse Button: Rotate Camra

Scroll Mouse Wheel: Zoom In/Out

C: Reset Camera Position

Left Click On Survivor: Observe Status and Focus on Character
